description: Returns information about the task logs for the specified task.

parameters.name: ReplicationInstanceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that the remaining results can be retrieved. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication instance.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceTaskLogs
nested_items.description: An array of replication task log metadata. Each member of the array contains the replication task name, ARN, and task log size (in bytes).

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskName
nested_items.description: The name of the replication task.

nested_items.name: ReplicationTaskArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the replication task.

nested_items.name: ReplicationInstanceTaskLogSize
nested_items.description: The size, in bytes, of the replication task log.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.
